root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 9-c-1, translated into en
root.data: As the UN specialized agency for Information and Communication Technology (ICTs), the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) is the official source for global ICT statistics, collecting ICT data from its Member States, see resolution 131 of the ITU Plenipotentiary Conference, https://www.itu.int/pub/S-CONF-ACTF-2022 .
